p: The ED 50 and IC 50 were determined using GraphPad Prism 5.0 software while hematological and biochemical data were analyzed using STATGRAPHICS Version 5.0. Statistical significance testing was done using Least Significant Difference followed by Fisher's test (ANOVA). P values of less than 0.05 were considered statistically significant. Data were then expressed as mean ± standard deviation (SD).
